overview: King Diamond at Palau dels Esports, Barcelona, Spain  Welcome Home  Tea  "Them"  Twilight Symphony  Come to the Sabbath  Halloween  A Mansion in Darkness  Guitar Solo [Andy La Rocque]  The Family Ghost  At the Graves  Sleepless Nights  A Visit from the Dead  Guitar Solo [Pete Blakk]  Charon  Mercyful Fate Medley [Satan's Fall / The Oath / A Dangerous Meeting / Snowy Shaw Drum Solo / Nuns Have No Fun / Evil]  The Wedding Dream  Victimized  Let It Be Done  Cremation
title: King Diamond: [1990] Ghosts of Barcelona
